cmake -S ./pcl -B ./pcl-build -DEIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR="D:\Programs\PCL 1.13.1\3rdParty\Eigen\eigen3" -DFLANN_INCLUDE_DIR="D:\Programs\PCL 1.13.1\3rdParty\FLANN\include" -DFLANN_LIBRARY_STATIC="D:\Programs\PCL 1.13.1\3rdParty\FLANN\lib\flann_s.lib" -DWITH_CUDA=FALSE -DWITH_DAVIDSDK=FALSE -DWITH_DOCS=FALSE -DWITH_DSSDK=FALSE -DENSENSO=FALSE -DWITH_LIBUSB=FALSE -DWITH_OPENGL=FALSE -DWITH_OPENMP=FALSE -DWITH_OPENNI=FALSE -DWITH_OPENNI2=FALSE -DWITH_PCAP=FALSE -DWITH_PNG=FALSE -DWITH_QHULL=FALSE -DWITH_QT=FALSE -DWITH_RSSDK=FALSE -DWITH_RSSDK2=FALSE -DWITH_VTK=FALSE -DBUILD_tools=FALSE -DBoost_INCLUDE_DIR="D:\Programs\PCL 1.13.1\3rdParty\Boost\include\boost-1_82" -DBoost_FILESYSTEM_LIBRARY_RELEASE="D:\Programs\PCL 1.13.1\3rdParty\Boost\lib\libboost_filesystem-vc143-mt-x64-1_82.lib" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DPCL_FLANN_REQUIRED_TYPE=STATIC -DPCL_SHARED_LIBS=FALSE -DBUILD_tracking=FALSE -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=./pcl-install
